entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, mentioned as the one Harry is trying to escape from.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, who is reflecting on his impending death and comparing it to others' deaths.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl, mentioned as someone he envies for having a quick and painless death.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to escape from Voldemort, who is the one he fears will kill him.
Harry envies Hedwig's quick and painless death, wishing he could have died like her.
